features: 【Used for eye and face】Filled with gel beads, our mask can be used both in hot and cold pack. It’s a great choice to save your eyes and face from tired and puffy. No more dark circles! Putting on the mask prior to makeup, then you will get bright skin
【Easy to use】In cold pack, just keep it in refrigerator for 1~2 hours, while in hot, you can keep in microwave less than 15 seconds or put it in hot water 5~10 mins. Just that easy!

【Ergonomic design】This gel mask design fully fits the eye contour, mouth angle and other facial curves. The small gel beads provides a close-fitting massage experience. Suitable for first aid at home, school, or office.
【Reusable】Contain gel beads of massage, the ice pack with breathable plush backing is made of gel pearl under 100% pressure testing, no break, no leakage, long life-time use.

【Your experience matters】--- High-quality products have always been our pursuit. If there is any problem with the product recived, please feel free to contact us at any time via Amazon, we will spare no effort to improve your experience with FUNNIR

productInformation.value: #36,914 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #409 in Facial Masks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more puffy face!
reviews.reviewText: Oh, I like this. This is one of the better face masks I have seen. I tend to wake up with puffy face some mornings and I could really use this mask to help reduce that puffiness. It covers my face entirely - even under my eyes where most of eye bags begin over sleepless nights or water retention. The color is a beautiful aqua that, to me, screams, "spa." The mask looks and feels well made and the gel beads feel really nice and squishy. The plastic seems sturdy enough to withstand heat or cold. Both sides of the mask are usable. The reverse side of the mask is soft and plush, like velour. The straps are adjustable and have velcro closure.I keep this mask chilled in the fridge in a special container so on the days I wake up puffy I don't have to wait a few hours for it to get cold. I can just reach for it and sit back with this cold mask on my face and relax for a few minutes. It's a lot better than using ice cubes on my face - this gel face mask works just as well without the mess of melting water. Cold packs really do work against fighting facial puffiness. You can almost feel the release when it is reduced. I haven't used this as a heat pack yet but I am glad it serves as both cold and heat pack.Excellent gel bead face mask. Attractive color and perfect fit on my face. It sits comfortably on my face and feels good on. It does what I want it to do. No more puffy face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For health and beauty :)
reviews.reviewText: This is a full face mask that can be used either cold or hot, depending on your needs. One side has the gel beads, and the other side is soft and plush, you can use it either way. As per the instructions, it tells you to keep in the fridge (not the freezer) for a couple of hours for cold therapy... or you can place it in the microwave or hot water for hot therapy. As part of my facial skincare routine I started incorporating ice massage on my face after cleansing and before applying makeup, but this mask makes it so much easier, no water dripping! ... Before placing in the fridge, I wiped it down with my simple mixture of white vinegar and water on both sides, and I keep it in the fridge inside a bag that's specially to keep items in the fridge, and always wipe it down after use and before going in the fridge again. I love how it feels on my face, it's very soothing and calming, it definitely elevates my skincare routine, but of course it has so many other benefits using it cold or hot for health and beauty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is not without its issues but it does help.
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used this as a hot pack but for cool relief, it's a gem. The cutouts on the mask fit a bit strangely, the eyes are fine but the nose and mouth are off. The area over the nose and below the eyes doesn't sit against your face snuggly, which is just frustrating. And if that weren't all, it really must be aired out before using, the smell is rather strong.That's not to say it's not helpful.. just flawed.Update: The seller quickly contacted me with a generous offer to replace my mask with a new one but I've adjusted the mask myself by carefully cutting the areas I had a problem with and it fits much more comfortably. The gel beads, when cooled, feels like heaven when my head or sinuses are bothering me and I'm quite happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft on the inside
reviews.reviewText: This is lined with a really soft fabric to shield your face from the plastic side. I keep mine in the fridge and put it on in the morning for 10-15 minutes when my face feels poofy. I've used similar things on my eyes before, but I love that this covers your entire face. There are stretchy velcro straps on the back to hold it in place. Just sit back and relax while it does it's magic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t fit my face well and is not comfortable when frozen. I will definitely use it just cold from the fridge though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it in the morning
reviews.reviewText: I prefer use this mask in the morning.It’s helps to reduce puffiness on my face and eyes.Just keep it in the fridge overnight and it’s ready to use in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Conforms to face nicely
reviews.reviewText: This face mask is filled with individual pea sized gel beads that can be moved around, making it easy to conform the mask to the exact contours of your face. One side of the mask is covered in a soft velour material and the other side is made from a flexible plastic. You can put either side against your skin depending on how cold/hot you want it feel on your skin (the fabric acts as a little bit of barrier and the temps don't feel as extreme on that side). It was easy to chill the mask (I put it in the fridge for a couple hours) and easy to heat the mask (I microwaved it for about 15 seconds). I especially love the chilled feeling on my skin - it feels so refreshing.FUNNIR Gel Beads Face Ice Mask Pack to Reduce Puffiness, Dark Circles, Hot Cold Compress Pack, Face Spa for Woman Sleeping, Pressure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool or hot relaxing feeling
reviews.reviewText: Good for hot or cold therapy.Lasts for 20 minutes (hot or cold)Soft smooth backing makes it very comfortable on your face.Adjustable Velcro straps that hold tight but will eventually fray with continued use use.Does not come with a protective bag which is very disappointing.
